channel.title: forest on Barefoot Rob
channel.description: Recent content in forest on Barefoot Rob

item.title: great session with D
item.description: 16:42 Sunday 18 November 2018 JST I was the only other man to show up for D’s men’s circle tonight. We walked to a park near his house which has a wooded area. Away from the busy-ness of the park, we settled in for a meditation and then got into my work. Wondering how to balance my projects, where to focus my energy, how to do the right thing?

item.title: civil war past life
item.description: Journal: my past life in the Civil War 3:07pm Saturday 10 January 1998 (transcribed from my diary) I just had an incredible experience at Kathy Fey’s. She is my body work professional type person, using Cranio-Sachral balancing, Reiki (sp) and massage to keep my body happy. I’ve been doing body work with her for a while and today she focused on my left hip. There’s been a bit of nagging almost pain there and to determine what is the deal with it, we did a “dialogue.
